channel.title: BluntForce Pk - Runescape Classic[offline-dead server]
channel.description:
Offline-- This Server is no longer online
[size=12pt][b]Blunt Force PK Server[/b][/size] Runescape Classic Private Server. You can still skill on this server if you'd like to. f2p pking server. (like kingpk) possible p2p wild on player demand- days specified. [url=http://postimg.org/image/tb93wrgy5/][img]http://s22.postimg.org/tb93wrgy5/screenshot25.png[/img][/url]
[b][size=10pt]About this Server:[/size][/b] [i]Rates: 87xnormal 95x Wild[/i] *PurePK Area for players to have a Blast!Requirements: Combat 37 or under,1-20 defense. [url=http://postimg.org/image/79nvju2rx/][img]http://s22.postimg.org/79nvju2rx/screenshot127.png[/img][/url] *Random Item Drop when you kill someone in the Wilderness up to Rune Items!
*new added dragons at ::spiders, can range through walls gates, fences, over water and lava now so these can be farmed, [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s13.postimg.org/hxwbdgxyv/screenshot144.png[/img][/url] lessers greaters to the 13 altar, [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s13.postimg.org/agn3y98fr/screenshot145.png[/img][/url] added one click swordfish in falador park* *Make Some Pizzas with Fat Tony in Bandit Camp. [url=http://postimg.org/image/c3c82fonh/][img]http://s22.postimg.org/c3c82fonh/screenshot125.png[/img][/url] *[b]Wilderness is F2p, exception you can use Prayer, regular attack and defense potions.[/b] *Pking skill - future of possible obtaining things with the levels *PkPoints- Obtained by killing a Player in the Wilderness. [url=http://postimg.org/image/wwa1d3rt9/][img]http://s22.postimg.org/wwa1d3rt9/screenshot129.png[/img][/url] *Magic portals to teleport to the wilderness hotspots.(automatically skulling players) *Diamond and Ruby ammies will teleport to wilderness 38 altar and castle with a free SKULL.
[b][i]Whats in Edgeville?[/i][/b] +Master Fisher for Lobsters. + Zaff sells Runes. >> or use ::buy command for runes and arrows +Lowe sells Arrows. >>^^ +Horvik sells Armour. +Wayne sells rune Armour +EDgeville store sells potions, ammys, and capes. +Gauis sells 2Handers and Amulets. +PKPExchange with new items being up for grabs with PkPoints. +King Percival to send ya to the pure pk area.
[b]How to Make Cash[/b] *Can Skill or Kill* Most Monster are in the Wilderness, along with 3 spots for King Black Dragon. Man drops herbs, coins, iron, steel. Guards drop coins and ruby ammys. Skellys west of the edge road drop coins mith items. hobs drop decent coins Moss Giants east of pirate house-- death runes + [url=http://postimg.org/image/qy0tgly8d/][img]http://s22.postimg.org/qy0tgly8d/screenshot126.png[/img][/url] Greater and lessers drop coins, rune wepons, plus [url=http://postimg.org/image/dwajd0kgd/][img]http://s22.postimg.org/dwajd0kgd/screenshot122.png[/img][/url] Red dragons Drop most rune items,coins,runes [url=http://postimg.org/image/3jo8qxqx9/][img]http://s22.postimg.org/3jo8qxqx9/screenshot119.png[/img][/url] King black drag and black demons drop some random stuff some rune and dragon items.
[b]Commands:[/b] ::buy-- buy runes or arrows with correct id ::spiders-- Death Rune Chests, death, fire, air Runes spawn. Dragons located here. ::dm and ::dm1-- Death Match Areas. ::dragons-- teleports to dragons. ::pkp-- displays pkpoints. ::edge--teleports to edge. ::onlinelist, ::online. ::commands-- to see all commands.
[b]*Server Pictures*[/b] [url=http://bluntforcepk.forumotion.com/t282-pictures-of-the-server-for-people-to-see#832] Pictures of the Server Click Here[/url]
[[size=12pt][b]Come Play With US:[/b][/size] Website: [url=http://Bluntforcersc.forumotion.com]Blunt Force Pk[/url] People Can Register at the Forums to talk in Chatbox if they'd like to. There is the NEW Client Download [sep 16th]. dl it and get inGame!!! See You On Blunt Force Pk!

item.title: BluntForce Pk - Runescape Classic[offline-dead server]
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

Krazy Jason:

fun server everyone should play

I agree… its quick, fast, and easy… the hard part is to get all the players online at the same time… it seems players keep hoping on and missing each other

FROM NOW ON EveryDay there will be a levle 43 DM Event for prizes.
Also, don’t forget there will be a drop party on the 5th this Saturday… possibly on the day before to on friday if players manage to hop on at the same time

Read full topic

Will die just like everything else.

I will keep this server ONline for a long time. Looking to always better bluntforce pk aswell, i have already made alot of changes that players like. Come try it out… try n get some pking going… i will also hold events for certain combat levels so0n.

item.title: BluntForce Pk - Runescape Classic[offline-dead server]
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

RSCRevolution:

Good luck

Thank you means alot

Arena has been made for people to gain the ability to use god spells outside of the wilderness. Looking to introduce an Event System so we can get some going.

so0n to be on a dedi to have less lagg and a smoother pking experience, This i believe is what people want before they even try the server. I have implemented most of what has been suggested to make this they best type of server for pking to be out thanks

Also, monsters outside of the Wilderness will be added-- for example taverly dungeons, under edgeville dungeon.

Read full topic

item.title: BluntForce Pk - Runescape Classic[offline-dead server]
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

[quote=“inspectah, post:10, topic:529361”][quote author=Vibes link=topic=648116.msg4361830#msg4361830 date=1378905173]

i would prob play it, but knowing its a server from you, who makes like 3 servers a month, that means u cant keep your players happy, server online or do shit. so nope

Thanks for the feedback bro, but i would like to say that in other servers people wanted a pk server and they were not it. As of now this is a Pk server and is here to stay so long as the people want it… i saw kingpk was pretty successfull so i based alot off that as people seemed to love it. This is my Last server so, it is here to stay as i have found what people want out of rsc. No one wants to no life and do all the gaqy tedious stuff that came with rsc as we are have lives now, so we just wanna pk and stake the best parts of RSC.
[/quote]

+1[/quote]
+1

Read full topic
